About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Fri 10am-5:30pm, Wed evening 7pm-8.30pm, Sat 10am-12pm; closed public holidays, and Christmas - New Year period. Reference assistance available ; photocopying available.

About.Acquisition focus: TheSwan Hill library gathers by gift, purchase, or legal copywork material including local history documents, photographs and booklets and makes copies available for open public access for everyday interest and research; also oral history tapes and transcripts.

About.Major holdings: Local photograph collections: A Feldtmann 1880's-1970; D Price 1880's-1965; K Dunoon 1890-1938; G Warne 1880's- (2m). Arthur Feldtmann: Typed Manuscripts (0.5m). Back-to and school committees: Back-to booklets of district 1911-(3m).
